'''''Amon Hen'' 225''' is the two-hundred-and-twenty-fifth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[September]] [[2010]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen225.jpg|Untitled <nowiki>[</nowiki>Book<nowiki>]</nowiki>]]''
** By: Susanne Stopfel
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Additional decorative artwork
** By: Steve Lines
* Announcements
* [[Rath Dínen]]: Zainab Thorp
* [[International Tolkien Fellowship|International]] Upcoming Events
** By: Susan Frances Edwards
* Report: A "Romantic" European Dream
** By: Abbie Taylor
* Report: Edge of the Wild Moreton-in-Marsh exhibition
** By: Joe Kraemer
* Report: "Writers in Influence..." NPG travelling exhibition
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* A Mariner's Tale
** By: Carol Brownlow
** With artwork by: [[Jef Murray]]
* Poem: ''[[Faerie]]'' (including decorative border)
** By: Susanne Stopfel
* [[Halbarad]] [[Dúnedain|Dúnadan]]: an unsung hero
** By: Angela Nicholas
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Madeline Flint
* Artwork: ''[[Nazgûl|Riders]] in Black''
** By: Jef Murray
* Review: ''Black Blood, White Hand'' CD
** By: Michael Cunningham
* Competition: win ''Black Blood, White Hand''
** By: Michael Cunningham
* Letters
* News from [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* [[Mathoms|Mathom]]
** By: Anne Mathison
* 2010 [[Tolkien Reading Day|Reading Day]] The Return
** By: "Tolkien Forever"
* Meet the Committee
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* Artwork: ''[[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and the [[The One Ring|Ring]]''
** By: Jef Murray
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
* New Members
* Member Profile
** By: Joel T. Terranova
* Dates for your Diary/Committee
